body.p: The affiant Alfred Brock states that he was a juror in the Case of the Commonwealth against Uriah Kevil &c which was tried at the last June term of the Lyon Circuit Court, & states that the testimony of Dr. Geiser did not agree with the ballance of the evidence adduced in the Cause, upon the trial of the Cause,
Sworn to before me by Alfred Brock this 5 day of August 1863,
I am personally acquainted with A Brock and know him to be a man of truth and veracity. Aug 5 1863.

A. H. Dudley clk
Lyon County Court
